description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 26th 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Solicitation for Sound Proof Booth: amendment 2
#### Reference Number: WS4378109059
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: WS4378109059

The solicitation is for the supply and installation of a sound proof booth. Proposals will be received electronically through the Canada Buys procurement platform.

**Key Timelines:**

*   **Publication Date**: January 11th, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 26th, 2024, at 14:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 21st, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: May 31st, 2024

**Procurement Method:**

*   **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Providers' Criteria:**

*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Procurement Entity:**

*   **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**User Entity:**

*   **Name**: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   **Name**: Kagetha Namasivayam (PSPC/SPAC)
*   **Email**: kagetha.namasivayam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Telephone**: Not Available
*   **Fax**: Not Available

### Related Information:

To access the solicitation documents, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18491519?extsite=MTg0OTE1MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18491519?extsite=MTg0OTE1MTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 
**Note:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted no later than January 26th, 2024, at 14:00 EST. All bids
